FuncDef: This command specifies the TCP/UDP port or port name to match the destination-port of the packet.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination port number to be used as a match criteria expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 65535 (accepted in decimal hex or binary).
Specifies the port list name to be used as a match criteria for the destination port.
Specifies the 16 bit mask to be applied when matching the destination port. Values-[0x0000 to 0xFFFF] | [0 to 65535] | [0b0000000000000000 to 0b1111111111111111].
